segments.text: Excuse me ? I didn't hear what you said .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I asked you if you wanted some help .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am new to this school and not familiar with this library . Can you help me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm looking for information on tropical fish .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . You can use the computer over there , enter ' tropical fish'under subject . If you know the title of the book , enter it under ' title '
segments.speaker: S2
